channel.title: RAMiCS on Mathieu @ ULaval
channel.description: Recent content in RAMiCS on Mathieu @ ULaval

item.title: RAMiCS 2017
item.description: I’m happy to announce that the submitted paper with Jules Desharnais titled “Relation as Images” has been accepted at RAMiCS 2017. Therefore, I’ll be in Lyon (France) in early May to present our recent work. This paper primarily defines two basic morphological operations (dilation and erosion) on binary images using a formalism from relation algebra.
